security.csp: default-src 'self' data:; script-src 'self'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data: blob:; font-src 'self' data:

bundle.shortDescription: An encrypted, local-first desktop journaling app
bundle.longDescription: Mini Diarium is a privacy-focused desktop journaling application. All diary entries are encrypted with AES-256-GCM at rest. Features include rich text editing, full-text search, calendar navigation, import/export, and automatic backups. No network access, no telemetry. Your journal stays on your device.
